arts.ttl: Arne Slot makes decision on Alexander Isak for Carabao Cup tie with Southampton - as Liverpool boss looks to integrate his £125million star following bitter Newcastle exit
arts.sum: Key men such as Alisson, Virgil van Dijk, Mo Salah and Ryan Gravenberch will all be given the chance to rest after a busy start to the campaign.

arts.ttl: Liverpool duo set for debuts against Southampton in Carabao Cup
arts.sum: Liverpool could make 11 changes and start Alexander Isak as well as goalkeeper Giorgi Mamardashvili and centre-back Giovanni Leoni

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Southampton predictions: Saints to play their part at Anfield
arts.sum: Liverpool host Southampton in the EFL Cup on Tuesday evening and James Milton expects the Reds to extend their winning streak in style at Anfield.
